data.text: Yesu hayahulumke mchidando, mtingano mkulu we iwanu tsaghumuwinza.
Imunu yumwe yane ukoma kamghendela, katowa ghamaghoti hambele hake, kamlongela, “Imtwatsa ung'abama, kwodaha kunenda nideghete.”
Yesu kagholosa ghumoko ghwake, kamkinda imunu ayo. Kalonga, “Nobama, udeghete!” Bahala imunu ayo kahona.
Kuya Yesu kamlongela, “Tegheletsa! Uleke kumlongela imunu wowose, ila ughende wikelanguse kwa mlapfa nambiko, kuya ulapfe inambiko iyalaghitse Musa, ka ukalangama kwe iwanu wose ka ghweghwe kuhona.”
Yesu hayengile Kaperinaumu, imkulu yumwe we asikali wa Roma kamghendela, kamlomba yamwapfile.
Kamlongela, “Imtwatsa, imtumwa wangu kawasa ukae, kaholola kuya koghula sideke.”
Yesu kamlongela, “Nitsoghenda kumhonetsa.”
Imkulu ayo kamwidika, “Imtwatsa nene sinoghile bae ghweghwe kwingila mng'anda mwangu, ila ulonge imbuli iliheka, imtumwa wangu katsohona.

Kwaapfila hata nene yanilongotsighwa ne iwakulu wangi, nina asikali yaniwalongotsa. Nomlaghitsa yuno, ‘Ghenda!’ naye koghenda, nomlaghitsa ayula, ‘Utse!’ naye kakutsa. Nomlongela imtumwa wangu, ‘Tenda chinu achi!’ naye kotenda pfipfo.”
Yesu hayahulike apfo kakangawala ghendo, kawalongela awala iwamuwinzile, “Nowalongelani, sina mbone bae imunu wowose mne isi ya Isiraeli iyotoghola pfino.
Nowalongelani ghendo, iwanu wangi watsakutsa kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsua na ubali wa kwalikuswela litsua, nawo watsokala mne chihungo hamwe na Abrahamu, Isaka na Yakobu mne undewa wa kulanga.
Lekeni awala iwabamighwe wawe mne undewa we Imulungu watsakwasighwa kunze, mne ichisi, ako watsolila na kughegheda ghamatsino.”
Kuya Yesu kamlongela imkulu yula, “Ghenda ukaye, na achila chautoghole chitsotendeka.”
Yesu hayapfikile ukaye kwa Petiri, kampfika mai wake mkwe Petiri kawasa mlusatsi, koghula lihoma.
Kamkinda ghumoko ghwake na lihoma limlawa, naye kenuka kandusa kumtumikila.
Nemihe haipfikile, iwanu wamghalila Yesu wanu wengi wane pfinyamkela, Yesu kawalapfa pfinyamkela kwa kulonga imbuli iliheka, kuya kawahonetsa iwatamu wose,
ili imbuli iyailongile nabii Isaya itimile,
Yesu hawonile mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu ghumtsunguluka, kawalaghitsa wanang'ina wake waloke kumwambu kwe tsimbu lya.
Kuya imlangulitsi yumwe wa Ghamalaghitso kamghendela, kalonga, “Mlangulitsi, nitsokuwinza kokose kwaughenda.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Iwambwa wa kumuhulo wana tsimango, na pfideghe iwali mlanga wana pfibali, lekeni imwana we imunu kahela hanu ha ukuwasitsa litwi lyake.”
Imwanang'ina wake yumwe kamlongela, “Mndewa, undeke tanu mbuke ukaye ng'amtsike aba wangu.”
Lekeni Yesu kamlongela, “Uniwinze, waleke iwanu iwafile wawatsike iwanu wawo iwafile.”
Kuya Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi, na iwanang'ina wake wamuwinza.
Bahala ilawila inyahemu ng'ulu mne tsimbu na ghamatsi ghang'ali ghakwingila mne mnumbwi, lekeni Yesu tsakawasa.
Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlamsa, walonga, “Imtwatsa, utukombole twotsama!”
Kawedika, “Mwemwe yamtoghola chidogho, ule mpfuka?” Kuya kenuka, kaikembela inyahemu na ghamawimbi, baho tsimbu linyamala tulu ghendo.
Iwanu wose tsawakangawala, weghutsa, “Angu ayu munu wachi? Hata libeho na ghamawimbi pfose pfomuhulikitsa!”
Yesu hayapfikile kumwambu, mne isi ya Gerasi ketingana ne iwanu weli wane pfinyamkela wolawa mne tsikabuli. Iwanu awo tsawakala wakali sideke, kuduhu imunu iyadahile kubita inzila ayo.
Bahala wakemelela, “Angu utubamila choni, ghwee Imwana we Imulungu. Pfii kutsa kutudununza ng'ana ichipindi chetu chipfike?”
Habehi ne hanu aho, tsakukala ne iwangubi wengi wakuja.
Pfinyamkela awo wamlomba Yesu, “Ung'atulapfa, utuleke twingile mne iwangubi wala.”
Kawalongela, “Haya laweni!” Baho wawalawa iwanu awo, wawengila iwangubi, na iwangubi wose watsumila mne muhulumko mkulu, wengila mne tsimbu na wose wafila mmatsi.
Iwadimi we iwangubi awo tsawatsuma mne ghumji. Hako wawalongela aghala ghose na achila ichiwalawilile iwanu wane pfinyamkela.
Kuya iwanu wose waghenda kwitingana na Yesu. Na hawamwonile, wamlomba yoke mne isi yawo.
